Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vehicle

  • public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    Model the vehicle. A vehicle is holding a list of assigned rides and the current location of the vehicle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

        public int distanceToRideStart(Ride ride)
        Calculate the distance from the current location of this vehicle to the starting point
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • waitTime

        public int waitTime(Ride ride)
        Calculate the maximum waiting time for this vehicle to start that ride that is assigned for.
        Parameters:
        ride - The ride that is assigned to this vehicle
        Returns:
        the waiting time for this vehicle to start the ride

      • arrival

        public int arrival(Ride ride)
        Calculate the finishing step when this vehicle finishes the assigned ride. It calculate th number of steps required to finish the ride, counting from the start, that is currentStep = 0
        Parameters:
        ride - The ride that is assigned to this vehicle
        Returns:
        the number of steps to finish the ride

      • canStartOnTime

        public boolean canStartOnTime(Ride ride)
        Check if this vehicle can start the assigned ride on time. Return true if this vehicle can, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        ride - The ride that is assigned to this vehicle
        Returns:
        true if this vehicle can start the assigned ride on time, false otherwise.

      • canFinishInTime

        public boolean canFinishInTime(Ride ride,
                               World world)
        Check if this vehicle can finish the assigned ride in time. Return true if this vehicle can finish the ride in time, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        ride - The ride that is assigned to this vehicle
        world - The world where the simulations happens
        Returns:
        true if this vehicle can finish the assigned ride in time, false otherwise.

        ride - the ride that assigned to the vehicle
